pageContext.collection_title: National Council of the Churches of Christ in the USA Broadcasting and Film Commission
pageContext.collection_description: The major product of the BFC was the National Radio Pulpit in the 1950s and 1960s
pageContext.collection_notes: It does not relate to this collection, but the archivist at the Presbyterian Historical Society hopes that someone with the NRPB can help him figure out how to get some of their collections digitized, particularly a set of discs, cut to acetate on aluminum, that they cannot access.
